comment: говорят радикалы, если игрок прилетает один

languages.text: "Стой, проклятое Дитя! Чтобы остановить тебя, нам пришлось вновь объединиться с ксеносами..."

traits.locale_text: [драфт] ну здравствуйте, не ожидали нас здесь увидеть?

languages.text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."
languages.original_text: "Стой, проклятое Дитя! Чтобы остановить тебя, нам пришлось вновь объединиться с ксеносами..."

traits.locale_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."
"Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."
"Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."
"Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."
"Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

languages.text: « Halte, Enfant maudite ! Une fois de plus, nous avons dû nous allier aux xénos pour vous arrêter... »
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: « Halte, enfant maudit ! Une fois de plus, nous avons dû nous allier aux xénos pour vous arrêter... »

languages.text: 「止まれ、呪われし子よ！お前を止めるために、もう一度異種族と手を組まなければならなかったのだぞ…」
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: 「止まれ、呪われし子よ！お前を止めるために、もう一度異種族と手を組まなければならなかったのだぞ…」

languages.text: “站住，被诅咒的孩子！为了阻止你，我们不得不再次与异形结盟……”
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: “站住，被诅咒的孩子！为了阻止你，我们不得不再次与异形结盟……”

languages.text: "Halt, verfluchtes Kind! Wir mussten uns erneut mit den Xenos verbünden, um Euch aufzuhalten ..."
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: "Halt, verfluchtes Kind! Wir mussten uns erneut mit den Xenos verbünden, um Euch aufzuhalten ..."

languages.text: «¡Alto, niña maldita! Hemos tenido que aliarnos una vez más con los xenos para detenerte...».
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto, niña maldita! Hemos tenido que aliarnos una vez más con los xenos para detenerte...»

languages.text: "Hele dur lanetli Çocuk! Seni durdurmak için yeniden zenolarla ittifak kurmamız gerekti."
languages.original_text: "Halt, cursed Child! We had to ally ourselves with the xenos once more to stop you..."

traits.locale_text: "Hele durun lanetli Çocuk! Seni durdurmak için yeniden zenolarla ittifak kurmamız gerekti..."
